title: Duo? üñ§
body:
Gold 4. Looking for a duo with a mic! 

Roles : Adc, Support Mid and i'm not the best at jungle or top but I can play those roles when needed.

I've just recently came back to play League after a 2 year break. I'm a little rusty but i'm getting there :) I was in Plat before I stopped playing I think lol. 

So I'm mainly looking for someone who knows all the new updates and best builds as I'm still new with it all. A lot has changed since I've been gone üòÇ 

IGN - Queen 0f Hearts (o is a zero)

Comment IGN if you're interested in helping me out üòò <3

replies.body:
Ingame Name: GrrGrrGadgetHook

Support main, prefer the tankier options but can play almost all supports well.

Have a lot of botlane knowledge, matchup/builds and such.

Added you :)

Morning I'm actually a support main myself, I one trick thresh from B4 to Silver 1, then Silver V now Silver 1 again.. Aiming for Plat by end of season.  

My op.gg - http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=birdious 

Check it out and I've added you in game.
